sentence.Network_en: Mack felt a pitiless contempt for her.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦克对她没有同情，只有鄙夷。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... penniless 身无分文的 pitiless 无情的 planless 无计划的.
英文单词有关残忍_百度知道 ... outrage n. 暴行 pitiless adj. 无情的，冷酷的，无怜悯心的 ruthlessness n. 无情，残忍.
英文单词有关残忍_百度知道 ... outrage n. 暴行 pitiless adj. 无情的，冷酷的，无怜悯心的 ruthlessness n. 无情，残忍.
Why is the world so awful , cruel , pitiless that make people cry ., 为什么世界会如此可怕 , 残酷 , 无情 , 以致于让人流泪?

list.abs: pitiless retribution , revenge , etc., 无情的报应 , 复仇等.
He was a pitiless tyrant ., 他是个残忍的暴君.
It was plain that the pitiless man made the boy suffer . The boy was pitiable ., 很显然 , 那个无情的男人折磨那个男孩 , 那孩子真可怜.
They strain , strain fiercely , against the pitiless might of the stream ., 他们使劲 , 拼命使劲 , 对抗着水流无情的威力.

entry.def: Someone or something that is pitiless shows no pity or kindness.

example.ex: He saw the pitiless eyes of his enemy...
example.tran: 他看到了敌人冷酷的眼神。

entry.def: If you describe something such as the weather or the heat as pitiless, you mean that it is very extreme.

example.ex: John Steinbeck used the dust and the pitiless skies as the backcloth to his novel.
example.tran: 约翰·斯坦贝克把尘土和烈日炙烤的天空用作小说的背景。

means.word_mean: 2. deficient in humane and kindly feelings
